name: Vaibhav Shukla
aboutText:
Hii! I am working with Affine Analytics as a Data Science Intern. I will complete my B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering in 2020 from Indian Institute of Information Technology Kalyani.

Strong data science and problem-solving skills, fast learner, technology enthusiast, impact-oriented.
 I've also completed Machine Learning and Deep Learning courses from Udacity.

I am driven by challenging, fast-paced, exciting, and educational environments. My areas of interest include Machine Learning and Deep Learning.

experience.name: Affine Analytics
experience.description: Currently doing my 6 months final semester internship with affine analytics working on data science problems.

experience.name: IIT Kharagpur - CSE Dept. - Dr. Pabitra Mitra
experience.description: Worked under Dr. Pabita Mitra on the topic of ‚ÄùFinding the weak juncture points between two steel plates welded together through the sonographic images of the steel plates‚Äù for TATA Steel.

publications.name: Automatic Humor Detection from Code-Mixed Tweets
publications.description: Co-authored a paper on detecting humour from Hindi-English Code Mixed Tweets using a Neural Network model,at the Forum for Information Retrieval Evaluation, published by ACM

projectData.name: Brain MRI Segmentation using Machine Learning(Runners Up, Smart India Hackathon 2019)
projectData.description: Our task was to segment brain MRI‚Äôs to find tumors and other areas of interest like Grey Matter, White Matter etc. using Deep Learning to help medical professionals.

projectData.name: AXIS Bank Signature Verification System
projectData.description: Devloped a signature verification system for Axis Bank under their Axis Bank AI Challenge held in Bangalore for recognizing real signatures of a persons from their forge signature and were in the top 10 teams out of more than 3700 teams.

projectData.name: Text Extraction from Driving Licenses using YOLO and OpenCV
projectData.description: Created a dataset of driving licenses by making bounding boxes around the text areas.Trained YOLO to identify such regions.Extracted text from predicted regions using OpenCV and Pytesseract.

projectData.name: Automatic Traffic Sign Detection and Recognition using YOLO
projectData.description: Worked on a YOLO neural network project to detect and recognise traffic signs and tell them to the driver to help the driver understand traffic signs even in adverse conditions and avoid collisions and traffic jams.

blogData.name: How to solve mismatch in train and test set after categorical encoding?
blogData.description: To solve the problem of unequal number of columns in train and test after one hot encoding.

blogData.name: https://medium.com/@vaibhavshukla182/pump-it-up-data-mining-the-water-table-f903d4cfc7a8
blogData.description: How I solved the data mining contest Pump it Up hosted by drivendata.org.

blogData.name: Information Extraction from Driving Licenses using YOLO
blogData.description: To automatically extract text information from DL's using ML.

blogData.name: Want to know the diff among pd.factorize, pd.get_dummies, sklearn.preprocessing.LableEncoder and OneHotEncoder
blogData.description: To explain the difference between these 4 encoding techniques.

journeySteps.heading: Passed class 12 in 2015 from ISC Board
journeySteps.description: I did my class 12 from Lucknow Public School,Lucknow in ISC Board securing 97% marks.

journeySteps.heading: 2016 Freshman at IIIT Kalyani
journeySteps.description: Joined Indian Institute of Information Technology Kalyani as a CSE undergraduate and focused on learning python in first year.

journeySteps.heading: Introduction with ML
journeySteps.description: In second year got introduced to Machine Learning by my seniors,immediatly fell in love with it, love at first sightüòâ

journeySteps.heading: Udacity ML and DL Nanodegrees
journeySteps.description: Completed the Nanodegress with great passion and flying colours.

journeySteps.heading: Some hackathons and challenges
journeySteps.description: Participated in few hackathons and challenges like Smart India Hackathon, Axis Bank AI challenge etc.Really enjoyed them and learned a lot.

journeySteps.heading: 3rd year summer internship
journeySteps.description: Completed my 3rd year summer internship with Dr. Pabitra Mitra as a research assistant at IIT Kharagpur

journeySteps.heading: Joined Affine Analytics as a 6 months data science intern
